snippet: The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said it received three complaints about possibly defective steering columns in three Crown Victoria police cars, which Ford stopped making last year.
lead_paragraph: The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said it received three complaints about possibly defective steering columns in three Crown Victoria police cars, which Ford stopped making last year.

headline.seo: Government Looks Into Ford Crown Victoria Police Cars
headline.main: Government Investigates Police Cars Built by Ford
headline.print_headline: Government Investigates Police Cars Built by Ford
